sentences.en: a pond covered with green scum
Get the scum of the streets, because you're too slow.
sentences.cn: 干掉街上的渣滓, 因为你太慢了.

sentences.en: I do not want scum like you with an mile of my granddaughter!
sentences.cn: 我不想你这样的人靠近我的孙女!

sentences.en: I skimmed the milk scum off the top with a piece of bread.
sentences.cn: 我拿块面包撇下牛乳的浮皮.

sentences.en: In the language of the layman the Epicrustal rocks can best be described as the'scum. "
sentences.cn: 用外行人的话来说,浅成岩最好称为 “ 浮渣 ”.

sentences.en: Not a word on why Scum could nt break us down.
sentences.cn: 别把斯卡姆打不到我们的原因说出去.

sentences.en: Skim the scum off the jam and let it cool.
sentences.cn: 撇去果酱上的浮沫，让它冷却。
那个人渣偷了我的自行车.

sentences.en: Someone had scrawled "Scum" on his car.
sentences.cn: 有人在他的车上涂写了“人渣”的字样。

sentences.en: The lazy scum deserve worse . What if they ain't fed up and pampered?
sentences.cn: 他们吃不饱, 他们的要求满足不了,这又有什么关系?

sentences.en: The scum has calls from the prefect's own office!
sentences.cn: 那个人渣从地方长官的办公室打来电话!

sentences.en: There is a ring of scum in the washbasin.
sentences.cn: 这个脸盆内有一圈污垢.

sentences.en: There was green scum over the pond.
sentences.cn: 池塘水面有绿色的浮藻.

sentences.en: They are the scum of the earth.
sentences.cn: 他们都是些人类的渣滓.

sentences.en: Why do they all treat me like scum?
sentences.cn: 为什么他们都象对待人渣一样对待我?

words.tran_cn: 下流的；满是浮渣的；浮渣一般的

trans.tran_en: an unpleasant dirty substance that forms on the surface of water
